document.discussion_title: New geopolitical crises demand a more dynamic EU neighbourhood policy
document.topic_text: New geopolitical crises demand a more dynamic EU neighbourhood policy Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 2 hours ago ) As divisions in Europe are hardening under the pressure of the biggest flow of refugees since WWII, experts are making the case to adjust the European Neighbourhood Policy (ENP), so that it’s ready to adapt and make the bloc resilient to rapid geopolitical changes.
